xss_injection.fix: Apply '| escape' or '| json' to all user-generated content.

csrf_attacks.pattern: HTML <form> tags used instead of Liquid {% form %}.
csrf_attacks.fix: Replace with Shopify native form tags (handles CSRF tokens automatically).

hardcoded_secrets.pattern: API Keys, Tokens, or Passwords in plaintext.

unauthorized_api.pattern: Direct calls to external APIs without proxy.

automated_action.action: Grep scan codebase for vulnerability patterns. Block save on Critical match.
